text:
@realDonaldTrump You spread harm/hate & YR PSYCHOLOGICAL ILLNESS on Twitter...U can’t control yourself... U hide in a bunker like a baby...U gas law abiding Americans...

Our loved ones are STILL DEAD of COVID-19 

Signed,

Families of 117,849 DEAD AMERICANS. 

PS: HAPPY OBAMA DAY!! .@parscale

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
